workshoptitle: Oracle Enterprise Manager - Job System Automation

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Introduction to Job System Automation Workshop

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Environment Setup
tutorials.description: Setup compute instance running EM 13.4 with pre-configured database targets using Terraform script and Resource Manager

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Job System Automation
tutorials.description: This lab provides an overview of the Enterprise Manager Job System and how to use it to automate routine administrative tasks such as backup, SQL scripts, OS jobs etc.

tutorials.title: Appendix: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
tutorials.description: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) you may refer to when troubleshooting issues encountered while executing above labs

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
